previous.title: Are there “right” answers to the most commonly asked interview questions? If so, what are they? Answer by Tessa White, Founder and CEO of SHE Team and The Job Doctor. https://t.co/U2OjdKsacz https://t.co/zLyW6Qm3ZD

localize.full_text: 最常见的面试问题是否有 "正确 "答案？如果有，它们是什么？由SHE团队和The Job Doctor的创始人兼首席执行官Tessa White回答。https://t.co/U2OjdKsacz。
最常見的面試問題是否有 "正確 "答案？如果有，它們是什麼？由SHE團隊和The Job Doctor的創始人兼首席執行官Tessa White回答。https://t.co/U2OjdKsacz。

next.title: What are some strategies to master difficult emotions like fear, anger, etc? Answer by @MattBodnar, Partner at Fresh Capital Group. https://t.co/bbcwgqeqTm https://t.co/r1Tyo4uF74

localize.full_text: 恐怖や怒りなどの難しい感情をマスターするための戦略を教えてください。回答者：@MattBodnar（Fresh Capital Groupのパートナー） https://t.co/bbcwgqeqTm https://t.co/r1Tyo4uF74
掌握恐惧、愤怒等困难情绪的策略有哪些？回答者：@MattBodnar，Fresh Capital Group合伙人 https://t.co/bbcwgqeqTm https://t.co/r1Tyo4uF74。
掌握恐懼、憤怒等困難情緒的策略有哪些？回答者：@MattBodnar，Fresh Capital Group合夥人 https://t.co/bbcwgqeqTm https://t.co/r1Tyo4uF74。
